Sehan

Korean: 세한

Country:

South Korea

Full name:

Group (2024-present):
AFOTS until Dec 31, 2024

Introduction

Sehan is a singer and dancer who debuted on August 22, 2024, with the group AFOTS. On December 27 of the same year, it was announced that he would be leaving the group.
